text: Robert George Dylan Willis (born Robert George Willis; 30 May 1949 â€“ 4 December 2019) was an English cricketer. He played for Surrey, Warwickshire, Northern Transvaal and England. He was a Wisden Cricketer of the Year for 1978. He was born in Sunderland, Tyne and Wear, England. Willis died on 4 December 2019 at the age of 70. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2019 deaths Category:English and Welsh cricketers Category:Sportspeople from Tyne and Wear
title: Bob Willis
